description:
A high-ranked demon has begun lurking the woods near Axel, and the local adventurers--including Megumin and Yunyun--are trying to do something about it.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakuretsu Musume to Mori no Irregular
Das Explosionsmädchen und die Unregelmäßigkeit im Wald
La fille explosive et le démon inhabituel
The Explosion Girl and the Forest Irregularity
名物[ばくれつ]娘と森の悪魔[イレギュラー]
